ValidationRule.description: Licensing is mandatory for the following Type of Agreement 1. Engine Integrators 2. Service Center/MRO 3. Avionics Dealers 4. BGA Mechanical Service center 5. Mechanical Components Repair Center
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISPICKVAL( Type_of_Agreement__c ,'Engine Integrators') ||ISPICKVAL( Type_of_Agreement__c ,'Service Center/MRO') ||ISPICKVAL( Type_of_Agreement__c ,'Avionics Dealers') ||ISPICKVAL( Type_of_Agreement__c ,'Mechanical Service Center') ||ISPICKVAL( Type_of_Agreement__c ,'Mechanical Components Repair Center')) &&(ISPICKVAL(Licensing__c,""))
